text: Neil deGrasse Tyson asks "If women ran the country, and they passed laws affecting menâ€™s reproductive organs, I wonder what the men would do?" I replied: We would sue them. Americans are individuals. If that means anything, I must be the ruler of myself. There is a border, beyond which no one goes w/o my permission, including the government. That border is my body. Even a Republican should understand that.
